PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_1_TEXT: LexFlow ("we", "our" or "us") is committed to protecting the privacy of our users and their clients. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when using our legal practice management system.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_2_TEXT: We collect the following types of information:
SECTION_2_ITEMS: Personal information: first name, last name, email address, phone
Firm information: firm name, country, city
Client and case data you add to the system
Documents and files uploaded to the system
Technical information: IP address, browser type, device
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_4_TEXT: LexFlow uses artificial intelligence to enhance your experience:
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_5_TEXT: We use Groq API (Llama models) for processing AI requests:
SECTION_5_ITEMS: Your data is NOT used to train AI models
Data is transmitted over encrypted connection
AI provider does not store your data after processing
You can use LexFlow without AI features — they are optional
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_6_TEXT: Your data is stored on Hetzner servers in Helsinki, Finland (European Union):
SECTION_6_ITEMS: Data does not leave the EU
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_7_TEXT: We understand the importance of attorney-client privilege:
SECTION_7_ITEMS: All client data is isolated by workspaces (multi-tenant architecture)
We do NOT access your client data except for technical support (with your explicit permission)
Documents and case information are encrypted at rest
You retain full ownership of all data you enter
We never disclose your data to third parties except when required by law
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_8_TEXT: We use the following third-party services:
SECTION_10_ITEMS: Account data: while account is active + 30 days after deletion request
Documents: until you delete them or close your account
AI chat history: until you delete them or close your account
SECTION_11_ITEMS: Access — request a copy of your personal data
Erasure — request deletion of your data ("right to be forgotten")
Portability — export data in a machine-readable format
Restriction — restrict processing of your data
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_12_TEXT: In case of a data breach affecting your personal data:
SECTION_12_ITEMS: We will notify affected users within 72 hours
We will notify relevant supervisory authorities as required by GDPR
We will provide information about the nature of the breach and measures taken
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_13_TEXT: We use only essential cookies for authentication and security. These cookies are required for login and CSRF protection. We do NOT use tracking or advertising cookies.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_14_TEXT: We may update this Privacy Policy. Changes take effect after publishing. For significant changes, we will notify you by email.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACTS_TEXT: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, contact us:

TERMS_OF_SERVICE.TITLE: Terms of Service
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.SECTION_1_TEXT: By using the LexFlow platform ("Service"), you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our Service.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.SECTION_2_TEXT: LexFlow provides a legal practice management system (SaaS) that includes:
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.SECTION_3_TEXT: To use the Service, you must:
SECTION_3_ITEMS: Maintain the security of your password
Be responsible for all activity in your account
SECTION_4_ITEMS: Subscription is paid monthly or annually
Payment is processed automatically through Stripe
Refunds are not provided except as required by law
Prices may be changed with 30 days notice
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.SECTION_5_TEXT: You agree NOT to use the Service for:
SECTION_5_ITEMS: Resale or transfer of access to third parties without permission
SECTION_6_ITEMS: All rights to the LexFlow platform belong to us
You retain rights to your uploaded data and documents
We receive a license to store and process your data to provide the Service
Copying, modification or distribution of our software is prohibited
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.SECTION_7_TEXT: The Service is provided "as is". We are not responsible for:
SECTION_7_ITEMS: Data loss due to force majeure
Indirect damages from using the service
Legal consequences of decisions made based on data in the system
SECTION_8_ITEMS: Suspend or delete your account for violating terms
Modify or discontinue the service with 30 days notice
Delete inactive accounts after 12 months of non-use
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.SECTION_9_TEXT: We may update these Terms of Service. Significant changes will be communicated to you via email. Continued use of the Service after changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.SECTION_10_TEXT: These Terms are governed by the laws of the Russian Federation. All disputes are subject to resolution in courts at our company's location.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.SECTION_11_TEXT: For questions related to the Terms of Service, contact:
